hard: High damage to the frontline – even though Qing Mao is a warrior she lacks defense. Focusing damage on the front lane will make Qing Mao die really fast. AOE damage will work as well.
Chabba – Chabba can eat for a few seconds enemy’s tank. Once there is no tank in from of Qing Mao she will go down really quickly.
soft: Armor artifact – Qing Mao has some built-in damage but she is often used to get extra armor penetration for her team. Using armor artifacts to deny this goal for the enemy team is a good way how to win the fight.
